docs.snippet: From a battery of surveillance cameras to extra security guards, Olympic officials have taken a series of measures inside Rio's doping lab to prevent a repeat of the manipulation of samples that sabotaged the drug-testing system at the 2014 Sochi ...

headline.main: IOC Steps Up Security to Prevent Sochi-Style Manipulation

docs.snippet: After the social network streams its first N.F.L. game on Sept. 15, it will assess whether live streaming can be a linchpin of its future....
docs.lead_paragraph: After the social network streams its first N.F.L. game on Sept. 15, it will assess whether live streaming can be a linchpin of its future.
docs.abstract: Twitter chief financial officer Anthony Noto says deal to live-stream National Football League games beginning in September will broaden their audience and bring in revenue from video advertising; company has made or is making similar agreements with other sports franchises as more marketers move from television ads to web promotions.

headline.main: With N.F.L. Deal, Twitter Live-Streams Its Ambitions
headline.print_headline: With N.F.L. Deal,  Twitter Streams  Its Ambitions

headline.main: Women Have Been Boxing in the Shadows for Too Long
